get.description: Retrieve anime from AniList API based on category. When using category=rekom, 'search' is required to perform a title-based recommendation.
get.summary: Get anime discovery list (popular, trending, ongoing, rekomendasi)

parameters.description: Search term. Required if category is 'rekom'
parameters.name: search

post.description: An email will be sent to reset password.

get.description: Only admins can retrieve all users.

parameters.description: Search by name or email or role
parameters.name: search

post.description: Only admins can create other users.

get.description: Get user session
Logged in users can fetch only their own user information. Only admins can fetch other users.

delete.description: Logged in users can delete only themselves. Only admins can delete other users.

patch.description: Logged in users can only update their own information. Only admins can update other users.

get.description: Only admins can retrieve all watchlists.

synopsis.example: Agate is a demon girl cursed with an eternal life. To forget the past, she throws half of her head into a deep valley and runs away. Unexpectedly, the tears flood the valley floor and form into a lake, triggering a flood in hell. Aloys, the Prince of Ghost comes to the Human World to find out the truth and finally finds the demon girl, starting a story of life and love.

Agate is a demon girl cursed with an eternal life. To forget the past, she throws half of her head into a deep valley and runs away. Unexpectedly, the tears flood the valley floor and form into a lake, triggering a flood in hell. Aloys, the Prince of Ghost comes to the Human World to find out the truth and finally finds the demon girl, starting a story of life and love.
